title: The Eyes Of Myrl
description: Tender romance in the brutal world of epic fantasy.The first book in the Kings of Tavia Series reveals a land where Gods and Goddesses control the currents of human fate, changelings sell their skills for gold and only those with dark magic in their blood can master dragons.Jestaen D'Myrl is the sheltered niece of the wealthy King of the Myrl clan. But the tangled web of her mother's deceit leaves her abandoned on the blood soaked battlefields of the Tordon Plains. Captured by a savage warlord the young woman is bartered as a pawn by the high lords who would be King.
author: Faelyn Rose
